content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest for copper plates at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine-1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving items from assembling machine to output chest
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Additional input chest at (6.5, 14.5)

### Power Generation System around (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 4924, 4932)
- Electricity network covering multiple poles around (0.5, 14.5)

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting Complex
Multiple mining and smelting setups:
1. First setup at (-28.0, -61.0):
- Burner mining drill
- Chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

2. Second setup at (-18.0, -53.0):
- Burner mining drill
- Chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

3. Coal mining setup at (41.0, -82.0):
- Burner mining drill
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Transport Systems
Multiple belt groups connecting various parts:
- Belt system from (8.5, 11.5) to (6.5, 12.5)
- Belt system from (4.5, 12.5) to (1.5, 14.5)
- Belt system at (5.5, 11.5) to (5.5, 13.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Issues with Automation Science Pack Production
- Ensure all required ingredients (copper plates and iron gear wheels) are available in input chests before attempting to extract products
- Monitor assembling machine status for ingredient shortages

### Power System Issues
- Keep boiler fueled with coal to maintain consistent power supply
- Monitor steam and water levels in the pipe systems

### Resource Management
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials (iron ore, copper ore, coal) to mining drills
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters and mining drills
- Keep input chests stocked with required materials for automation science pack production

### Entity Placement
- Verify connections between entities in production chains
- Ensure inserters are properly oriented for pickup and drop-off positions
